Uses of Interface
se.swedenconnect.security.credential.PkiCredential

Packages that use PkiCredential
Package
Description
se.swedenconnect.security.credential
Generic support for X.509 credentials.
se.swedenconnect.security.credential.container
Support for credential containers.
se.swedenconnect.security.credential.factory
Spring factory beans for creating credential objects.
se.swedenconnect.security.credential.opensaml
Credentials defined for use with OpenSAML/Shibboleth.
se.swedenconnect.security.credential.pkcs11conf
Interfaces and classes for handling PKCS#11 provider configuration.

    Abstract base class for classes implementing the PkiCredential interface.

    Abstract base class for reloadable credentials.

    A basic implementation of the PkiCredential interface.

    A KeyStore backed implementation of the PkiCredential and ReloadablePkiCredential interfaces.

    A PKCS#11 credential implementation of the PkiCredential and ReloadablePkiCredential interfaces.
